directions: Whisk together the mayonnaise, yogurt, ginger, lime rind, salt and pepper.
In a mixing bowl, combine the snow peas, chicken, onion and water chestnuts.
Pour dressing over salad and mix gently. Cover and refrigerate until chilled.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
title: Chicken and Snow Pea Salad
